actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the law of the District of Columbia relating to the reporting of certain physical abuse of children.

summary.text: Extends the provisions of the District of Columbia law relating to child abuse to provide for reporting by medical personnel and other persons involved in child care.

titles.title: A bill to amend the law of the District of Columbia relating to the reporting of certain physical abuse of children.
